S

sendPrivateMessage(String) - Method in class academy.mindswap.server.Server.ClientHandler
Using our output buffer to send private messages to the client If we can't communicate, we call a method that checks if this client lost connection And send a client lost connection message to the clients
Server - Class in academy.mindswap.server
This class is responsible for the server side of the game.
Server() - Constructor for class academy.mindswap.server.Server
Open a ServerSocket that will wait for players connection Prepare a list of clients waiting for the game Prepare a list of clients Online Call a method that will listen the players trying to connect to server (acceptClient())

startBuffers() - Method in class academy.mindswap.server.Server.ClientHandler
Start the way of receive (input) and send (output) communication with our client (socket)
startGame() - Method in class academy.mindswap.server.Game
Start everything we need to get our game playing call method to shuffle our game deck, add the first card to the timeline table, call a method to start players deck, choose a random player to start playing, call a method to send a welcome message to all the players, and start the game.
